text: Parvardigoraton ʙa holi sumo ogohtar ast ci kas sazovori hidojat ast va ci kas sazovor nest. Agar ʙixohad, ʙar sumo rahm mekunad va ʙa sui imon tavfiq mefarmojad va agar ʙixohad, ʙar kufr sumoro memironad, azoʙaton mekunad va mo turo, - ej Muhammad,- nigohʙoni onho va muroqiʙi ahvoli onon nafiristodaem
